name: Confederation of Trade Unions of Montenegro
goal: Improving of workers' rights; Improving and development of the social dialogue; bargaining and conclusion of  collective bargaining agreements at all levels; decent work and life of workers and their families; better social protection of workers and their families; improvement socio-economic policies in our country; EU integration; protection of vulnerable categories of people; occupational health and safety of workers; better condition at work place; fight against any kind of mobbing or harassment at work place etc
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Public Health, Regional Policy, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: Our practice is to implement EU policy standard whenever it is possible and adoption of EU standards and European Social Charter provisions are integral part of our Statute. Our organization is a member of Joint Consultative Committee of European Union and Montenegro;
